pages.title: Crimson Manatite
pages.text: A Manatite attuned to Strength with Runes of Strength.$(br)A Ring forged with this Manatite will grant the wearer increased defense and will temporarely boost the user's damage. When used in a staff the caster can unleash a powerful explosion.
$(l)Staff Target:$()$(li)Blocks (aim a block with an air space above)$(br2)$(l)Staff Effects:$()$(li)Explosion

pages.title: Crimson Staffs
pages.text: Power and Range of the effects depend on the tier of the staff.$(br)Wooden is the worst. Silver has good range, but weaker effects and moderate cooldown. Gold has abysmal range, but powerful effects with a long cooldown. Archmage is the best.
